generated.css: html{scroll-behavior:smooth;box-sizing:border-box;font-size:100%}*,:after,:before{box-sizing:inherit}:root{--font-body:"Open Sans",sans-serif;--heading-first:50px;--heading-second:40px;--heading-second:25px;--color-primary:#000;--color-secondary:#fff}h1{font-size:var(--heading-first)}h2{font-size:var(--heading-second);font-weight:600}h3{font-size:var(--heading-third);margin:0}a:focus{outline:none}li,ul{margin:0;padding:0}button:active,button:focus{outline:none!important}body{font-family:var(--font-body);font-size:1rem;font-weight:400;line-height:1.5;margin:0;padding:0;background-color:var(--color-primary);color:var(--color-secondary);overflow-x:hidden}.navbar{z-index:1000}.navbar-brand{font-size:2rem;font-weight:600}.navbar.active{background-color:#dc143c}@media screen and (max-width:992px){.navbar{background-color:#dc143c}}.hero{height:100vh}.hero .subhead{position:relative}.hero .subhead:after{content:"";width:4rem;height:3px;background-color:var(--color-secondary);position:absolute;top:50%;margin:0 .5rem}.hero .heading{font-size:var(--heading-first);font-weight:700}.hero .desc{width:90%}.hero__img{width:200%}@media screen and (max-width:992px){.hero{margin-top:5rem;text-align:center}.hero .subhead:after{display:none}.hero__img{width:100%}}.about{padding:150px 0;background-color:var(--color-secondary);color:var(--color-primary)}.about__img__box{width:400px;height:400px;position:relative}.about__content .heading{font-size:var(--heading-second);font-weight:600;position:relative}.about .heading:after{content:"";width:4rem;height:3px;background-color:var(--color-primary);position:absolute;top:50%;margin:0 .5rem}.tech__list ul{margin-left:1rem}.tech__list li{margin-bottom:.3rem}.about .desc p{line-height:1.8}@media screen and (max-width:992px){.about__content{margin-bottom:3rem}}@media screen and (max-width:550px){.about{padding:100px 0}.about__img__box{width:250px;height:250px}}.services{padding:150px 0}.services__heading{position:relative;margin-bottom:8rem}.services__heading:after{content:"SERVICES";position:absolute;top:-4.4rem;left:50%;transform:translateX(-50%);font-size:150px;font-weight:700;opacity:.05}.services__box{border:2px solid #efefef;padding:2rem 1rem;border-radius:5px;transition:.5s ease-in-out}.services__box:hover{transform:translateY(-10px)}@media screen and (max-width:768px){.services{padding:100px 0}.services__heading{margin-bottom:4rem}.services__heading:after{top:-1.6rem;transform:translateX(-50%);font-size:70px}.services__box{padding:1.5rem .5rem}}.portfolio{padding:150px 0;background-color:var(--color-secondary);color:var(--color-primary)}.portfolio__heading{position:relative;margin-bottom:8rem}.portfolio__heading:after{content:"PORTFOLIO";position:absolute;top:-4.4rem;left:50%;transform:translateX(-50%);font-size:150px;font-weight:700;opacity:.05;color:var(--color-primary)}.portfolio__box{position:relative;transition:all 1s ease-in-out}.portfolio__box:hover:after{opacity:1}.portfolio__box:after{background-color:rgba(0,0,0,.8);content:"";height:100%;right:0;top:0;width:100%}.portfolio__box:after,.portfolio__hover__box{opacity:0;position:absolute;transition:all .5s ease-in-out}.portfolio__hover__box{background-color:rgba(0,0,0,.5);cursor:pointer;font-size:1.4rem;left:50%;padding:1rem 1.5rem;top:50%;transform:translate(-50%,-50%);z-index:3}.portfolio__hover__box a{text-decoration:none;color:var(--color-secondary)}.portfolio__box:hover .portfolio__hover__box{opacity:1}.contact{padding:150px 0}footer .copyright{border-top:1px solid hsla(0,0%,100%,.2);margin:0}@media screen and (max-width:768px){.contact,.portfolio,.services{padding:100px 0}.contact__heading,.portfolio__heading,.services__heading{margin-bottom:4rem}.contact__heading:after,.portfolio__heading:after,.services__heading:after{top:-1.6rem;transform:translateX(-50%);font-size:70px}.services__box{padding:1.5rem .5rem}}.social{position:fixed;bottom:10%;left:3rem}.social__box{position:relative}.social__box:after{content:"";position:absolute;left:.6rem;bottom:-5.5rem;width:2px;height:80px;background-color:#dc143c}.social__box a{text-decoration:none;color:#dc143c}.social__box i{font-size:1.5rem}.social__box a:not(:last-child){margin-bottom:1.4rem}@media screen and (max-width:768px){.social{display:none}}
